faqs.q: Does walking in place burn calories effectively?
faqs.a: Yes, it burns calories similar to light walking, around 3-4 kcal per minute depending on your weight and pace.

faqs.q: How many calories does walking in place burn per hour?
faqs.a: Approximately 200-250 kcal per hour for a 70 kg person at moderate intensity.

faqs.q: Is walking in place as good as outdoor walking for calorie burn?
faqs.a: It's comparable for low-intensity sessions but may burn slightly less without terrain variation; intensity matters most.

faqs.q: What factors affect calories burned walking in place?
faqs.a: Body weight, pace, duration, and added movements like knee lifts; heavier individuals burn more.

faqs.q: Can walking in place help with weight loss?
faqs.a: Yes, when combined with a calorie deficit diet; aim for 30-60 minutes daily to contribute to overall burn.
